summary: Taylor Swift's 11th album, *The Tortured Poets Department*, came out in 2024. It started as one album but later became a double album called *The Anthology*. Swift wrote it while on tour and used it as a way to express her feelings about fame. The songs are about her life, both public and private, and have a sad and angry tone. The album has a mix of music styles and got a lot of attention, breaking records on music platforms. Critics had mixed opinions, but many praised Swift's honest lyrics.
title: The Tortured Poets Department
